entry.title: Launch HN: HyperLinq (YC S21) – Desktop trading terminal
entry.summary: Hi HN, my name is Amar, and I am the founder and CEO at HyperLinq (https://hyperlinq.io/). We are building HyperTrader, a simple yet powerful native desktop trading terminal. Our app currently supports cryptocurrency trading, but we will soon expand into other asset classes like US stocks. We make it easy for traders to track multiple portfolios, discover the best prices, execute orders faster and analyze their trades. Between my co-founders Karamvir and Kunal and myself, we have over 30 years of experience building trading systems. Karamvir and I worked at an inter-dealer broker in NYC and built many trading systems together. We also used to trade cryptocurrency. Back then there was a huge price disparity between exchanges, so we were able to do arbitrages. We looked around and couldn't s…
